DLG SPR_0
I'm not a cat

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
"""
{shk}knock
knock{shk}
...nothing
"""

DLG SPR_2
you hear begging and weeping from inside

DLG SPR_3
The King comes

DLG SPR_4
"""
{wvy}SIGH{wvy}
Times are tough
"""

DLG SPR_5
"""
^- The Agaite castle
<- Bogs
-> ____
v- no no nonononononononononono
"""

DLG SPR_6
oh no

DLG SPR_7
oh no!

DLG SPR_8
oh no?

DLG SPR_9
"""
I fear that this is the last sunset
i'm determined to enjoy it to the fullest
"""

DLG SPR_a
I thank thee.

DLG SPR_b
To the south, I believe, there is a town called Lu

DLG SPR_c
We have had sightings of the Red Worm beyond the gate. By order of the king, nobody may leave or enter.

DLG SPR_d
the creatures brought forth from the device require several things. some require attention, some time. Most require blood

DLG SPR_e
"""
{sequence
  - I am not the King
  - The King comes
  - It is far too late
}
"""

DLG SPR_f
wahaha! Waluigi, numbah one!

DLG ITM_1
I remember ...

DLG ITM_2
We had found the cartridge at a yard sale

DLG ITM_3
"""
We both vaguely remembered it.
Not enough to recall any details,
but the more we talked, the more sure we were that we had seen it before, perhaps in a magazine.
"""

DLG ITM_4
It was 5 dollars, I talked the seller down from 10. it had a worn name in sharpie on the back.

END 0
We played the game long into the night, sharing memories of playing the game as children.
"do you remember the part with the red worm?" 
"and what about that one dungeon"
we talked until our throats went horse and the sun came up 

VAR a
42
